data.title: HIPAA 164.306 (a) (1) : Validate confidentiality and integrity of PHI
data.phrase:
//Security standards: General rules. (a) General requirements. Covered entities and business associates must do the following: (1) Ensure the confidentiality, integrity, and availability of all electronic protected health information the covered entity or business associate creates, receives, maintains, or transmits.

datamodel | filter xdm.observer.product contains "Cortex" | fields xdm.observer.*

data.title: HIPAA 164.306 (a) (2): Threat Protection
data.phrase:
//Protect against any reasonably anticipated threats or hazards to the security or integrity of such information.

datamodel | filter xdm.observer.product contains "Cortex" | fields xdm.observer.*

data.title: HIPAA 164.306 (a) (3): Protect against information disclosure
data.phrase:
//Protect against any reasonably anticipated uses or disclosures of such information that are not permitted or required under subpart E of this part.

datamodel | filter xdm.auth.privilege_level contains "" | fields xdm.auth.* | limit 500

datamodel = Auth dataset in(xdr_data)

| limit 100
*/

data.title: HIPAA 164.308 (a) (1) (i) (A): Identify risks and Vulnerabilities
data.phrase:
//Risk analysis (Required) Conduct an accurate and thorough assessment of the potential risks and vulnerabilities to the confidentiality, integrity, and availability of the electronic protected health information

dataset = host_inventory

data.title: HIPAA 164.308 (a) (1) (i) (B): Reduce risks and Vulnerabilities
data.phrase:
//Risk management (Required). Implement security measures sufficient to reduce risks and vulnerabilities to a reasonable and appropriate level to comply with § 164.306(a).

dataset = endpoints
| fields endpoint_name, assigned_extensions_policy, assigned_prevention_policy
| filter assigned_extensions_policy contains "Windows Default"

data.title: HIPAA 164.308 (a) (1) (i) (C): Apply sanction policy when members fail to comply
data.phrase:
//Sanction policy (Required). Apply appropriate sanctions against workforce members who fail to comply with the security policies and procedures of the covered entity or business associate.

dataset = endpoints
| fields endpoint_name, assigned_extensions_policy, assigned_prevention_policy
| filter assigned_extensions_policy contains "Windows Default" //Change windows default to sanction policy

data.title: HIPAA 164.308 (a) (1) (i) (D): Regularly review audit logs
HIPAA 164.308 (a) (4) (i) (A): Isolate health care clearinghouse functions
data.phrase:
//Isolating health care clearinghouse functions (Required). If a health care clearinghouse is part of a larger organization, the clearinghouse must implement policies and procedures that protect the electronic protected health information of the clearinghouse from unauthorized access by the larger organization.

datamodel | filter xdm.auth.privilege_level contains "" | fields xdm.auth.* | limit 500

data.title: HIPAA 164.308 (a) (6) (i): Identify/rspond to known security incidents
HIPAA 164.308 (a) (7) (i) (A): Data backup plan
data.phrase:
//Data backup plan (Required). Establish and implement procedures to create and maintain retrievable exact copies of electronic protected health information.

dataset = endpoints 
| comp values(endpoint_name) as Endpoint, count(agent_license_type) as Total by encryption_status 
| fields encryption_status, Endpoint, Total 
| sort desc Total

data.title: HIPAA 164.308 (a) (7) (i) (B): Data recovery plan
data.phrase:
//Disaster recovery plan (Required). Establish (and implement as needed) procedures to restore any loss of data.

dataset = endpoints 
| comp values(endpoint_name) as Endpoint, count(agent_license_type) as Total by encryption_status 
| fields encryption_status, Endpoint, Total 
| sort desc Total

data.title: HIPAA 164.312 (a) (1): Access control
data.phrase:
//Standard: Access control. Implement technical policies and procedures for electronic information systems that maintain electronic protected health information to allow access only to those persons or software programs that have been granted access rights

datamodel | filter xdm.auth.privilege_level contains "" | fields xdm.auth.* | limit 500

data.title: HIPAA 164.312 (a) (2): Unique user identification
data.phrase:
//(i) Unique user identification (Required). Assign a unique name and/or number for identifying and tracking user identity.

datamodel | filter xdm.auth.privilege_level contains "" | fields xdm.auth.* | limit 500

data.title: HIPAA 164.312 (b): Audit controls
HIPAA 164.312 (c) (1): Implement policies or procedures to protect PHI
data.phrase:
//Standard: Integrity. Implement policies and procedures to protect electronic protected health information from improper alteration or destruction.

datamodel | filter xdm.observer.product contains "Cortex" | fields xdm.observer.*

data.title: HIPAA 164.312 (d): Person or entity authentication
data.phrase:
//Standard: Person or entity authentication. Implement procedures or entity seeking access to electronic protected health information is the one claimed.

datamodel | filter xdm.auth.privilege_level contains "" | fields xdm.auth.* | limit 500

data.title: HIPAA 164.312 (e) (1): Transmission security
data.phrase:
//Standard: Transmission security. Implement technical security measures to guard against unauthorized access to electronic protected health information that is being transmitted over an electronic communications network.

datamodel | filter xdm.auth.kerberos_tgt.encryption_type contains "AES" | fields xdm.auth.* | limit 500
